overview_summary: The one profiled neighboring landowner has not expressed a clear stance on development (classified as unknown). They also have no notable community influence, as there are no high-influence neighbors identified (this neighbor holds no public office or leadership roles).

neighbors.name: Gary L. Irving Sr. and Dolores K. Irving
neighbors.claims: Gary L. Irving Sr. (with Dolores K. Irving) is a Jefferson County landowner, listed in a 2016 county tax notice for the Bolivar area [Spirit of Jefferson Advocate](https://wvlegals.com/jefferson-county-wv-delinquent-tax-list-2016/). Neither Gary nor Dolores Irving has a public profile of civic engagement; for example, their names do not appear among federal farm program participants or local official records [EWG Farm Subsidy Database](https://farm.ewg.org/addrsearch.php?searchstring=1925).
neighbors.influence_justification: No public office or civic role

approach_recommendations.engage: As private individuals, a personal, low-key approach—ideally through a mutual neighbor or community contact—can help build trust and allow them to share any concerns discreetly.
